revised_title: Classification of a Fossil Found at Dudley in Staffordshire
tldr: The author examines a fossil found in Staffordshire and determines it to be a crustaceous animal, specifically a type of Pediculus marinus. This conclusion is based on the specimen's physical characteristics and is supported by the work of Edward Lhuyd, who described a similar fossil in his Lithophylacium Britannicum Ichnographia.
